text: Reza Alinejad (رضا علی نژاد, born September 21, 1985) is an Iranian at risk of execution for accidentally killing a man in self-defense when he was 17 years old. He is subject of several human rights campaigns, who protesting against his sentence, because of evidence that his act was a self-defense and he was under age if 18 - his death sentence is a violation of international law, Tehran had signed. Recently, his case was transferred to Tehran for Head of Judiciary Mahmoud Hashemi Shahroudi review. == Related pages == * Delara Darabi === Other websites === * Stop Child Executions * Help Reza * Save Delara campaing on Reza Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Human rights Category:Iranian people
title: Reza Alinejad
